---
id: address-search
title: "AddressSearch"
description: "Search for a valid address - useful for user input when the address can be malformatted or incomplete, this endpoint returns formatted address which can be used for ICP search."

hide_title: true

custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"AddressSearch"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/address-search"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Search for a valid address - useful for user input when the address can be malformatted or incomplete, this endpoint returns formatted address which can be used for ICP search.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"address","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
